songs.title: Tough Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I see you [?]
I see you [?]
I see you waiting for the [?], honey
I see you getting kind of [?]

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cuz you know you're right to make it okay
All the time when you try to make me feel good

[Chorus]
This tough love [?]
This tough love
Touch, touch, touch, hard feelings to control
I see you your heart is glowing, glowing, glowing for me

[Verse 2]
I see you [?]
I see you [?]
I see you waiting for the [?], honey
I see you getting [?]

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cuz you know you're right to make it okay
All the time when you make me feel good
